display_help: You can use this power to Parry incoming melee attacks. The Parry itself does minor damage, but every successful hit will increase your Defense against melee attacks for a short while. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast
display_target_help: You can use this power to Parry incoming melee attacks. The Parry itself does minor damage, but every successful hit will increase your Defense against melee attacks for a short while. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast
